Projects

Azure VM Ops

This project demonstrates foundational Azure administration skills through the deployment and management of a Windows virtual machine in Microsoft Azure. The lab focuses on core operational tasks including resource organization, virtual networking, network security group configuration, controlled remote access, and cost awareness. The project was completed as a personal hands-on lab to reinforce AZ-104 concepts and basic Azure operational workflows.
